!Trader Tyra: Welcome, I am Tyra. I live here in the Dark Forest, alone with nature, because I hate the hustle and bustle of the village. But I'm not lonely, since I often meet adventurers in the forest such as yourself. If you need an item or something, I will give you a low price.
